snippet: Yahoo's latest efforts to contain the controversy surrounding the embellished credentials of its chief executive do not seem to impress Daniel S. Loeb.
abstract: Yahoo's latest efforts to contain the controversy surrounding the embellished credentials of its chief executive do not seem to impress Daniel S. Loeb.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Third Point Calls for Interim C.E.O. at Yahoo
